revised_title: Urine and the Ejection of Foreign Objects: A Collection of Cases
tldr: The author presents a series of case studies involving the ejection of various objects and substances through urine. These cases include the expulsion of hair, needles, lumps of fat, and even leaden bullets. The author discusses the possible explanations for these phenomena, including the existence of hidden channels for urine and the potential for the digestive system to expel waste through urine.
